title: Bartenura Dolce Noir | Bartenura
text: BARTENURA DOLCE NOIR TYPERed VARIETALCabernet SauvignonBarbera STYLESemi-Sweet TASTING NOTES: This luscious, semi-sweet red wine is a delightful balance of fruity and earthy notes. The nose reveals aromas of ripe black cherry, raspberry, and plum. The sweetness is well integrated, with a lingering and satisfying finish.
